Granite had chosen to stay behind with Cave-In, and now the vultures come i=
n! (He means Serge) Sure enough, the Preds took KitKat with them, probably =
to get repaired, but they forgot about Cave-In, and now she's not only dead=
, but nobody will know she's dead unless Granite tells them. That's okay, t=
hough, Granite had dealed with psycho's, headhunters, martians, humans, gia=
nts, cyclops, demons, high authority, monsters, plante destroyers, jabroni'=
s, assholes, angry salemen and cannibals, and out of them all, he had the m=
ost fun destroying the cannibals, which was certainly what Serge was. He wa=
tched the large dinosaur start lookig more the weak bots, but he smelled Gr=
anite. A good sense of smell would lead Serge right into Granite's rifle! S=
erge transformed to robot mode and fired upon the rock, blasting Granite 10=
 feet. He jumped to his feet. Serge must have not smelled blood, so he knew=
 that Granite was un-injured! Granite watched as Serge aimed the blaster, c=
arefully dodging missiles and shots...
